headline: There’s an Opportunity Brewing in These 2 Construction Stocks, Says UBS
summary: The election is behind us, and we’re looking ahead. A new Trump Administration will take office in January, and a few things are starting to become clearer. On the economy, Trump has already expressed a preference for raising tariffs – especially on Chinese goods – while also reducing income taxes and promoting a deregulation regime. These policies will push in multiple directions, so it may take some time to see exactly where things will go. Most likely, neither the best nor worst cases will co
